channel.title: Need A Development Team
channel.description:
Hi Moparscapians, First Off Ill mention the spots available. [b]NOTE[/b]: YOU MUST HAVE A SKYPE ACCOUNT AND MOST IMPORTANTLY YOU HAVE TO BE TRUSTWORTHY AND HAVE SOME KNOWLEDGE ABOUT CODING / MAKING A RSPS. 1) I Need a [Server Tester] For Bugs , dupes , etc. 2) I Need a [Coder] Knowledge of a rsps, however many years you have, etc. [s]3) I Need a One More coder/assistant/co-owner/handles the server/trustworthy, etc.[/s] 4) I Need a [suggester] to suggest some ideas etc. 5) [s]I Need Many more staff members and a graphics designer / knowledge about web designing , etc.[/s] *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** We Can talk more about this at skype , Mic is not needed we can chat it out and discuss.
This Server is a 317 based and Has a lot of features , and My aim is to make this server the best and for that I need a good development team and ofcourse you have to be trust-worthy. I will make sure you are trusted and have some pretty good knowledge about coding.
My Dream is to have a fully functioning server with not more than 80 players , ofcourse satisfied players and our development team has to work hard. Im sure we can work this out.
Anything that you want to discuss about positions , etc ADD ME ON SKYPE.
I Will show all the features of the server, if you interested in joining my team.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- If you want to apply for any of the above positions here is the format : Name: Skype Name: What Role You Want: Java Experience in d/m/y ( Days, Months or Years ): Why You Want This: Age: How Active You Are: (if a coder, I test proof of skill)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Apply now and lets make this an awesome server , dont miss out your chance of not making yourself a part of this awesome development team / server and ofcourse anything you want to ask about , Im always available at skype. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [size=14pt][b]MY SKYPE : "fbi-melroy"[/b][/size] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- EDIT : [GFX DESIGNER / WEB DESIGNER] IS UNAVAILABLE , WE GOT ONE - MICHAEL. [I Need a One More coder/assistant/co-owner/handles the server/trustworthy, etc.] IS UNAVAILABLE , WE GOT ONE - MATT

item.title: Need A Development Team
item.dc:creator: @melroy melroy
item.description:
@melroy wrote:

Hi Moparscapians, First Off Ill mention the spots available.
NOTE: YOU MUST HAVE A SKYPE ACCOUNT AND MOST IMPORTANTLY YOU HAVE TO BE TRUSTWORTHY AND HAVE SOME KNOWLEDGE ABOUT CODING / MAKING A RSPS.

  1. I Need a [Server Tester] For Bugs , dupes , etc.
  2. I Need a [Coder] Knowledge of a rsps, however many years you have, etc.
    3) I Need a One More coder/assistant/co-owner/handles the server/trustworthy, etc.
  3. I Need a [suggester] to suggest some ideas etc.
  4. I Need Many more staff members and a graphics designer / knowledge about web designing , etc.

We Can talk more about this at skype , Mic is not needed we can chat it out and discuss.

This Server is a 317 based and Has a lot of features , and My aim is to make this server the best and for that I need a good development team and ofcourse you have to be trust-worthy. I will make sure you are trusted and have some pretty good knowledge about coding.

My Dream is to have a fully functioning server with not more than 80 players , ofcourse satisfied players and our development team has to work hard. Im sure we can work this out.

Anything that you want to discuss about positions , etc ADD ME ON SKYPE.

I Will show all the features of the server, if you interested in joining my team.

If you want to apply for any of the above positions here is the format :
Name:
Skype Name:
What Role You Want:
Java Experience in d/m/y ( Days, Months or Years ):
Why You Want This:
Age:
How Active You Are:
(if a coder, I test proof of skill)

Apply now and lets make this an awesome server , dont miss out your chance of not making yourself a part of this awesome development team / server and ofcourse anything you want to ask about , Im always available at skype.

[size=14pt]MY SKYPE : “fbi-melroy”[/size]

EDIT : [GFX DESIGNER / WEB DESIGNER] IS UNAVAILABLE , WE GOT ONE - MICHAEL.
[I Need a One More coder/assistant/co-owner/handles the server/trustworthy, etc.] IS UNAVAILABLE , WE GOT ONE - MATT

Read full topic
